author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Refuge Biotechnologies Raises $10 Million In Equity Financing
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Refuge Biotechnologies:
* REFUGE BIOTECHNOLOGIES FILES TO SAY IT HAS RAISED $10 MILLION IN EQUITY FINANCING FROM A TOTAL OFFERING AMOUNT OF $25 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text : [ bit.ly/2rEZTi2 ]
